string-array.name: no_time_to_die
string-array.item: James Bond has left active service. \nHis peace is short-lived when Felix Leiter, an old friend from the CIA, turns up asking for help, leading Bond onto the trail of a mysterious villain armed with dangerous new technology.
Writers: Neal Purvis, Robert Wade, Cary Joji Fukunga
Stars: Daniel Craig, Ana de Armas, Rami Malek
